column3: College of Medical, Veterinary & Life Sciences
column5: Cardiovascular disease is projected to remain the single leading cause of death over the next two decades, accountable for considerable disability and reduction in quality of life.The aim of this programme is to deliver teaching related to cardiovascular science and biology with an emphasis on the epidemiology, genetics, pathological and molecular mechanisms underlying cardiovascular diseases and their pharmacological management.Why this programmeThe University of Glasgow has a world-renowned reputation for expertise in cardiovascular research and education.Â
